title: Phase 1: Text-to-Speech Engine
description: Implement TTS system using ElevenLabs to provide voice narration for the game. Powers Chronicle narration, character dialogue, and Trial sequences.

title: Backend Proxy Service
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create Fastify backend server with /api/tts/speak endpoint (streaming response), API key management, request validation, CORS setup, and health check endpoint.
close_reason: Implemented by polecat furiosa - TTS proxy endpoints with Zod validation, CORS, API key management

title: ElevenLabs API Integration
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create ElevenLabs API client wrapper with textToSpeech() method, getVoices() for voice discovery, streaming response handling for long text, error handling/retries, and TypeScript types for API responses.
close_reason: Implemented ElevenLabs API client with textToSpeech() streaming, getVoices(), exponential backoff retries, and full TypeScript types

title: Redis Caching Layer
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Implement caching layer for TTS: cache key strategy (hash of text + voice + settings), Redis connection with ioredis, cache-aside pattern, buffer streamed response for storage while forwarding to client, TTL policies (7 days narration, 30 days static dialogue), cache hit/miss logging.

title: Client-Side TTS Service
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Create TTSService class for browser: audio queue for sequential playback, playback controls (pause, resume, skip, stop), Web Audio API handling, volume control, preloading for anticipated speech.

title: Voice Configuration System
description: Create voice registry with role mappings (narrator, judge, npc, inner_voice), implement voice preset system for different contexts (chronicle, dialogue_calm, dialogue_intense, trial_judgment), runtime voice switching, voice selection UI for testing.

title: TTS Testing & Documentation
description: Unit tests for TTS service, integration tests with mocked ElevenLabs, E2E test for full speech flow, API documentation, usage examples. Target: >80% coverage on TTS service.

title: Shared TTS Types
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Define shared TypeScript types in @reckoning/shared: TTSRequest, SpeakOptions, VoiceRole, VoicePreset, ITTSService interface. These types will be used by both client and server.
close_reason: Implemented by polecat furiosa - SpeakOptions and ITTSService types added to @reckoning/shared
